collectionType.title: OviTrap/Local
collectionType.description: Select Local for a local accessment of the Mosquito Problem and OviTrap for an assessment of egg count.

username.title: Username
username.description: An explanation for 'root.*.username' about the purpose of string instance with editor path 'root.*.username'.

trapNumber.title: Trap Number
trapNumber.description: All OviTraps have a unique trap number, add number here if applicable.

eggCount.title: Egg Count OviTrap
eggCount.description: the number of eggs detected on the OviTrap

comments.title: Title of 'root.*.comments' Type: 'string'
comments.description: An explanation and additional comments of users.

problem.title: Problem Comment
problem.description: Additional comments according to mosquito problem found at geolocation.

problemIndoorOutdoor.title: Outdoor/Indoor Problem
problemIndoorOutdoor.description: select option if the mosquito problem is Indoor or Outdoor

problemIndoorOutdoorSituation.title: Indoor/Outdoor Situation
problemIndoorOutdoorSituation.description: An explanation for problem situation (indoor or outdoor)

date.title: Date
date.description: Date when the data is collected

time.title: Time
time.description: Time when the data is collected

cityName.title: City
cityName.description: Name of the City where the data was collected

geoLocation.title: GeoLocation
geoLocation.description: Geolocation where the data was collected
